title: Saudi Arabia - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Saudi Arabia stands at A- with positive outlook. Moody's credit rating for Saudi Arabia was last set at A1 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Saudi Arabia was last reported at A with positive outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Saudi Arabia thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Saudi Arabia as reported by major credit rating agencies.
